definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Cassava is a starch crop of which the product harvested is the root tubers.
sentences.chinese: 木薯是淀粉作物，收获的产品主要是块根。

sentences.english: Cassava brown streak disease is a more destructive form of cassava mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 木薯褐条病是木薯花叶病中危害性较大的一种病。

sentences.english: Cassava brown streak disease is a more destructive form of cassava mosaic.
sentences.chinese: 木薯褐条病是木薯花叶病中危害性较大的一种病。

sentences.english: And it was concluded that the renewable capability of cassava-based ethanol was better than that of gasoline.
sentences.chinese: 得到木薯乙醇燃料可再生性优于汽油的结论。

sentences.english: As the chips dry, they become lighter.
sentences.chinese: 木薯片干燥以后，就会变轻。

sentences.english: In Ghana, for instance, the favourite dish is fufu – mashed cassava.
sentences.chinese: 比如在加纳，人们最喜欢的食物是木薯泥。

sentences.english: Mechanized scale root peeling and grating technologies.
sentences.chinese: 机械化木薯削皮及粉碎技术。

sentences.english: Therefore, Ag -bands can be used as identification marker of chromosomes of cassava.
sentences.chinese: 因此，可将银染带作为木薯染色体的识别标记。

sentences.english: Furthermore, the case about the impact assessment of cassava-based ethanol and gasoline has been analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 以木薯燃料乙醇和汽油为案例，进行了案例分析。

sentences.english: Non-genetically modified cassava is used as raw materials of the starch.
sentences.chinese: 淀粉采用非转基因木薯为生产原料。

sentences.english: Part 1 is the study of VHG (very high gravity) ethanol fermentation by Saccharomyces cerevisiae.
sentences.chinese: 酿酒酵母木薯高浓度乙醇发酵的研究。

sentences.english: that are going to have that high cyanide content, so we should all be relieved.
sentences.chinese: 氰化物的木薯制品，因此我们都可以放心了。

sentences.english: Tapioca is starch obtained from tuberous roots of the bitter cassava, native of South America.
sentences.chinese: 木薯粉是南美本地产的苦薯的块根制作。

sentences.english: Drain the cooked manioc, return to the pan and mash with a potato masher or fork.
sentences.chinese: 排水熟木薯，返回泛醪和一个马铃薯烤至或叉子。

sentences.english: Food was very simple - mainly cassava and matooke, which was cooked over an open fire.
sentences.chinese: 食品非常简单，主要是木薯和大香蕉，在露天烹制。

sentences.english: Cassava starch-rich roots, known as the "king of starch."
sentences.chinese: 木薯块根淀粉丰富，被誉为“淀粉之王”。

definition: yam bean (Pachyrhizus erosus), a vine with sweet edible root
